review: Its not netflix level,  but I think it will be one day. So with Amazon prime being a few dollars cheaper for a years worth and free music and shipping its well worth the value.

review: So far so good.  Love it.

review: We love this it works perfect on our flatscreen which isn't a new model "smart" TV.

review: I ABSOLUTELY love the Fire TV Stick. It is so easy to set up and use. I would recommend it to any and everybody.

review: Very simple way to turn a normal boring TV into a smart tv. I use it all the time
